profile.name: Hello, I am Jiseong Kim.
profile.intro:
I am a product builder who enables rapid iterations through unparalleled agility and resilience to failure. 
Leveraging my expertise in front-end technologies like NextJS, I encompass backend, planning, design, and infrastructure, allowing for close communication and swift creation of outstanding products.

achievements: Promotional Design Automating AI SaaS, Creazy

projects.title: MEDAI ARNA

Contributed Areas 
1. Solely planned and designed the entire UI

projects.title: groopy
projects.introduction: A no-code platform where anyone can easily create and share AI teams
projects.description:
Try out a professional AI Agent team in just 10 seconds. 
Make your own AI team in 10 minutes.

groopy is a platform where anyone can easily create, share, and sell their own multi-agent AI teams.

groopy allows anyone, even non-engineers, to effortlessly create AI teams that embody their expertise, automate tasks, realize ideas, and create economic opportunities.

projects.title: KUIN
projects.introduction: An ultra-short-term project outsourcing platform that finishes within 48 hours
projects.description:
This project was conducted over about two weeks as a side project, where I handled everything from planning and design to frontend and backend development on my own. 
This platform is an ultra-short-term project matching service that supports clients to focus on more important tasks by handling necessary but tedious jobs like website modifications and event page designs within 48 hours.

Through this service, clients can entrust necessary development or design tasks to professionals in a short period without the need to hire developers or designers permanently for small-scale, non-continuous work. This maximizes business efficiency for clients.
